node.title: Bad blood between Nuggets and Heat after NBA MVP Nikola Jokic blindsides Markieff Morris
node.alt: Miami's Markieff Morris lies on the court after being hit by Denver's Nikola Jokic
node.description: The NBA's Nuggets and Heat clash in Denver over an ugly incident that results in MVP Nikola Jokic and Miami's Markieff Morris being ejected — and a furious Jimmy Butler and other Heat players waiting for the Nuggets outside afterwards.
node.content:
["An ugly clash between Nikola Jokic and Markieff Morris has overshadowed the Denver Nuggets' NBA\u00a0win over the Miami Heat,\u00a0with both players ejected and furious Heat trying to carry things on after the game.", "With 2:39 remaining, Morris bumped Jokic in the midsection as the NBA MVP was throwing a pass at half-court.", "Jokic retaliated with a hard shoulder into the back of an unsuspected Morris, whose head snapped back as he fell to the floor.", "Morris rolled in pain as teammates pushed Jokic away.", "Medical personnel brought a stretcher onto the floor but Morris was able to get up and walk off the floor on his own.", "As things got heated, Heat star Jimmy Butler was on the sidelines, pointing at the Nuggets bench and urging NBA MVP Jokic to \"bring that shit to the back [of the court], let's go\".", "The Heat players were still angry after the game, waiting in a corridor outside the court for their Nuggets counterparts to come back to the locker room.", "", "
Miami Heat players were not happy with the hit on Markieff Morris, and they waited for the Denver Nuggets outside after the game.(Getty Images / Media News Group / Denver Post: Aaron Ontiveroz)
", "The Heat said Morris has an apparent neck injury. Jokic said he saw a replay of the altercation and recoiled when he saw how hard Morris\u00a0hit the floor.", "\"I felt bad, really bad,\" Jokic said.", "Heat coach Erik Spoelstra said they were still waiting to find out more about the severity of the injury, but that Morris was moving around in the locker room.", "Morris was assessed with a flagrant foul and ejected, Jokic also was ejected and Butler received a technical foul.", "Spoelstra said Jokic's actions were \"absolutely uncalled for\", but\u00a0Jokic said Morris's initial hit went beyond a hard foul.", "Jokic's teammate, Jeff Green, said it was\u00a0\"a play that shouldn't happen\".", "\"I think Markieff just went and tried to make a hard foul. I don't think he had any intention of hurting Joker,\" he said.", "\"But sometimes when things like that happen, you don't know the intention of the other person and you just react and that's what Joker did.\"", "AP/ABC"]
